get.summary: Get Product Search of Who Saw Also Saw
get.description: Retrieves general information about other related products that the users also saw

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Product unique identifier

sellers.sellerName: COMPANHIA BRASILEIRA DE TECNOLOGIA PARA E-COMMERCE

productTitle.title: productTitle
productTitle.description: Text that is in the browser tab and corresponds to the title of the product page. This field is important for SEO.

metaTagDescription.title: metaTagDescription
metaTagDescription.description: Brief description of the category. It's recommended that you don't exceed 150 characters so that the search engines can display it correctly in the results page.

categories.title: categories
categories.description: Array of the product's categories URLs.

categoriesIds.title: categoriesIds
categoriesIds.description: Array of the product's categories IDs.

allSpecificationsGroups.title: allSpecificationsGroups
allSpecificationsGroups.description: Array of the product's specifications groups.

description.title: description
description.description: Description of the main information related to the product. A simple and easy to understand summary for the customer.

items.title: items
items.description: Array containing the product SKU general information.

sellers.sellerName: COMPANHIA BRASILEIRA DE TECNOLOGIA PARA E-COMMERCE
COMPANHIA BRASILEIRA DE TECNOLOGIA PARA E-COMMERCE

ean.title: ean
ean.description: SKU unique identification code (barcode), accepts up to 13 numerical characters.

Value.title: Value
Value.description: Unique reference code used internally for organizational purposes.

measurementUnit.title: measurementUnit
measurementUnit.description: Used only in cases when you need to convert the unit of measure for sale. In common cases, use 'un'.

unitMultiplier.title: unitMultiplier
unitMultiplier.description: numerical unit that multiplies the selected quantity of the product when it is inserted in the cart.

isKit.title: isKit
isKit.description: If the SKU is part of a kit.

kitItems.title: kitItems
kitItems.description: Array with information of SKUs components from a Kit.

amount.title: amount
amount.description: Amount of the SKU component in the kit.

images.title: images
images.description: Array of information about the SKU image.

imageLastModified.title: imageLastModified
imageLastModified.description: Date and time of the last update of the image.

default.sellerName: COMPANHIA BRASILEIRA DE TECNOLOGIA PARA E-COMMERCE
COMPANHIA BRASILEIRA DE TECNOLOGIA PARA E-COMMERCE

sellerName.title: sellerName
sellerName.default: COMPANHIA BRASILEIRA DE TECNOLOGIA PARA E-COMMERCE

addToCartLink.title: addToCartLink
addToCartLink.description: URL to add the product to the cart.

sellerDefault.title: sellerDefault
sellerDefault.description: If the seller is default or not.

commertialOffer.title: commertialOffer
commertialOffer.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

TotalValuePlusInterestRate.title: TotalValuePlusInterestRate
TotalValuePlusInterestRate.description: Total value plus interest rate of the installment.

PaymentSystemName.title: PaymentSystemName
PaymentSystemName.description: Payment system name of the installment.

PaymentSystemGroupName.title: PaymentSystemGroupName
PaymentSystemGroupName.description: Payment system group name of the installment.

BuyTogether.title: BuyTogether
BuyTogether.description: Array of other products that can be bought together with the product in question.

PriceWithoutDiscount.title: PriceWithoutDiscount
PriceWithoutDiscount.description: Price of the product without discount.

PriceValidUntil.title: PriceValidUntil
PriceValidUntil.description: Price of the product valid until a certain date.

IsAvailable.title: IsAvailable
IsAvailable.description: If the product is available or not.

SaleChannel.title: SaleChannel
SaleChannel.description: Trade policy which the product is contained.

CacheVersionUsedToCallCheckout.title: CacheVersionUsedToCallCheckout
CacheVersionUsedToCallCheckout.description: Cache version used to call checkout.

get.summary: Search for Products with Filter, Order and Pagination
get.description: Retrives general information about the store products. This information can be filtered and ordered by a number of options. It also can be pagineted, filtered and ordered.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Describes the type of the content being sent

parameters.name: _from
parameters.description: Starter page range. These parameters allow the API to be paginated. Take into account that the initial and final pages cannot have a separation superior to 50 pages. Thus, it will be displayed 50 items per page.

parameters.name: _to
parameters.description: Finisher page range. These parameters allow the API to be paginated. Take into account that the initial and final pages cannot have a separation superior to 50 pages. Thus, it will be displayed 50 items per page.

parameters.name: ft
parameters.description: Filter by full text. The form is`ft={searchWord}`

parameters.name: fq
parameters.description: General filter. It can be by category (`fq=C:/{a}/{b}`), by specification (`fq=specificationFilter_{a}:{b}`),  by price range (`fq=P:[{a} TO {b}]`), by collection (`fq=productClusterIds:{{productClusterId}}`), by product ID (`fq=productId:{{productId}}`),  by SKU ID (`fq=skuId:{{skuId}}`), by Reference ID (`fq=alternateIds_RefId:{{referenceId}}`), by EAN13 (`fq=alternateIds_Ean:{{ean13}}`), by availability at a specific sales channel (`fq=isAvailablePerSalesChannel_{{sc}}:{{bool}}`), by available at a specific seller (`fq=sellerId:{{sellerId}}`)

parameters.name: O
parameters.description: Sorting method. It can be by Price (`O=OrderByPriceDESC` or `O=OrderByPriceASC`), by Top Selling Products (`O=OrderByTopSaleDESC`), by Best Reviews (`O=OrderByReviewRateDESC`), by Name (`O=OrderByNameASC` or `O=OrderByNameDESC`), by Release Date (`O=OrderByReleaseDateDESC`), by Best Discounts (`O=OrderByBestDiscountDESC`), by Score (`O=OrderByScoreDESC`)

parameters.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand
